title: E-Commerce Website
description: eCommerce website made with PHP and React, for Scandiweb Junior Full Stack Developer test task

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: TicTacToe Game built with React and tailwindcss

title: Ticket Scanner
description: ticket-scanner is a simple ticket management system that allows for ticket generation and QR code scanning. It stores ticket information in an SQLite database and supports real-time ticket verification, showing whether a ticket is valid, already used, or does not exist. Perfect for event organizers to manage access control.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A simple Rock Paper Scissors game built with Python's Tkinter library.

title: Github Scraper
description: A React application that allows users to search for GitHub profiles and view detailed information about them, including repositories, followers, and more, by utilizing the GitHub REST API.
